titles.title: It Is Glory Just To Walk With Him

authors.author: Avis Marguerite Burgeson Christiansen Haldor Lille

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: It is glory, just to walk with Him. newline It is glory, just to walk with Him. newline He will guide my steps aright, newline Thro' the vale and o'er the height. newline It is glory, just to walk with Him.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: It is glory, just to walk with Him, newline Whose blood has ransomed me. newline It is rapture for my soul each day, newline It is joy divine to feel, newline To feel Him near. newline Where'er my path may be, newline Bless the Lord, newline It's glory all the way.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It is glory when the shadows fall, newline To know that He is near. newline Oh what joy to simply trust and pray, newline It is glory to abide in Him. newline When skies above are clear, newline Yes, with Him it's glory all the way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 'Twill be glory when I walk, newline With Him on heaven's golden shore. newline Never from His side again to stray, newline 'Twill be glory, wondrous glory, newline With the Savior evermore, newline Everlasting glory all the way.
